reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 266/06: NEW TEACHER INDUCTION PROGRAM

content.content: 1. (1) This Regulation sets out, for the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 270 (1) of the Act, the elements of the new teacher induction program in which a teacher is required to participate. O. Reg. 266/06, s. 1 (1). (2) Every new teacher shall participate in the element of the new teacher induction program set out in paragraph 1 of subsection 268 (2) of the Act. O. Reg. 266/06, s. 1 (2). (3) The following new teachers shall participate in the elements of the new teacher induction program set out in paragraphs 2 and 3 of subsection 268 (2) of the Act: 1. New teachers who have never previously taught in any jurisdiction. 2. New teachers who have previously taught only as occasional teachers. O. Reg. 266/06, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) This Regulation sets out, for the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 270 (1) of the Act, the elements of the new teacher induction program in which a teacher is required to participate. O. Reg. 266/06, s. 1 (1).

(2) Every new teacher shall participate in the element of the new teacher induction program set out in paragraph 1 of subsection 268 (2) of the Act. O. Reg. 266/06, s. 1 (2).

(3) The following new teachers shall participate in the elements of the new teacher induction program set out in paragraphs 2 and 3 of subsection 268 (2) of the Act:

1. New teachers who have never previously taught in any jurisdiction.

2. New teachers who have previously taught only as occasional teachers. O. Reg. 266/06, s. 1 (3).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 266/06, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 266/06, s. 2.
